intent_atoms.description: Provide a canonical export schema for media metadata that can be used by both compatibility-focused and rich-detail consumers.
The proposed schema must include all fields present in Bento4 mp4dump, ISOInspector, and FFmpeg ffprobe exports, with clear naming conventions and coverage gaps addressed.
Adapters should be defined to allow future exporters to map their output to the canonical schema without breaking existing consumers.
The export schema must remain backward compatible with current ISOInspector output structure during analysis.
Extend JSONExportSnapshotTests and add new CLI integration checks to validate compatibility aliases and format summary block before modifying production schemas.
